long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to enhance the user experience of DePauw Course Selection.
This extension works with SoC website: https://my.depauw.edu/e/reg/soc-view/

With this extension:
1. Users can select the courses they want on SoC website and get them recorded in a floating table.
2. Auto-calculate time conflict between the courses selected.
3. Auto-calculate total credit chosen.
